ObjectClass.Name: Marine
ObjectClass.Description: MARINE: Slow ground biological foot soldier Builds basic structures Powerful in large groups Splash damage weapon (upgradable) [ Weapons Avg Damage/5secs ] VS Ground: 55 (+13) VS Air: 55 (+13)

Objective.Name: Move
Objective.Details: \Move to specified location

Objective.Name: Attack
Objective.Details: \Attack specified target or \enemies encountered en route \to specified location

Objective.Name: Patrol
Objective.Details: Hold CTRL and select up to 5 points to\continuously patrol around\Target one of your own units to HOLD\current position or select a single\location to HOLD that position

Objective.Name: Change Commander
Objective.Details: \Set this unit's commander\ \Alt-Right-Click on unit to\select its current commander

Objective.Name: Remove from Hierarchy
Objective.Details: \Remove unit from hierarchy\to disconnect from commander\and all subordinates

Objective.Name: Priority
Objective.Details: \While Moving or Attacking,\subordinates will break formation\and move at their top speeds

Objective.Name: Build
Objective.Details: \Select a building to create:\ \RP, IMPORTER, ARMORY,\FACTORY, COMM CENTER

Objective.Name: Ride in a Tank
Objective.Details: \Hitch a ride on the closest tank

Objective.Name: Stop
Objective.Details: \Interrupt current objective\and return to idling

Objective.Name: Resource Processor
Objective.Details: - place near resource crates\Small building\processes L-Crystals and Q-Plasma\Convert Q-P into L-C\Can move itslef

Objective.Name: Importer
Objective.Details: Medium building\imports reserve soldiers\Reserve Soldiers are released\into the battle field as troops,\drivers or pilots of vehicles

Objective.Name: Factory
Objective.Details: Medium building\produces the following units:\MECH, ATHC, LANCER, TANK,\TORNADE

Objective.Name: Armory
Objective.Details: Medium building\performs tech tree upgrades\produces the following units:\MARINE, SPECIAL OP

Objective.Name: Comm Center
Objective.Details: Small building\extra wide visibilty radius\Toggles:\ Auto-heirarchy and smart-idle\enables making of CARRIER unit

Objective.Name: Chronoport
Objective.Details: \Chronoport to a specified time\ Must be near a Chronoporter\ Must not have a TSS

Objective.Name: Chronoport
Objective.Details: Not Available\ Requires the Gate Tech\ upgrade at the ARMORY

Objective.Name: Teleport
Objective.Details: \Teleport to a specified location\ Must be near a Teleporter

Objective.Name: Chronoport
Objective.Details: \Chronoport to a specified time\ Must be near a Chronoporter

Objective.Name: Teleport
Objective.Details: \Teleport to a specified location\ Must be near a Teleporter\ Must not have a TSS

Objective.Name: Importer
Objective.Details: Medium building\Imports RESERVE SOLDIERS\ RESERVE SOLDIERS are deployed\ automatically to drive or\ pilot the vehicles you build

Objective.Name: Factory
Objective.Details: Medium building\Produces the following units:\MECH, ATHC, LANCER, TORNADE,\TANK

Objective.Name: Armory
Objective.Details: Medium building\Performs tech tree upgrades\Produces the following units:\MARINE, SPECIAL OP

Objective.Name: Comm Center
Objective.Details: Small building\Extra wide visibilty radius\Toggles:\ Auto-heirarchy and smart-idle\Allows MECHs to build CARRIERs
